title: Speak - The language learning app that gets you speaking

structured_metadata.og_title: Speak - The language learning app that gets you speaking
structured_metadata.og_description: Speak is the first & only app that lets you get real conversational practice without needing a live tutor on the other end. And we build some serious AI tech to make that possible.
